Class ModifyPartController

java.lang.Object
controller_controllerfiles.ModifyPartController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ModifyPartController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The controller class for the modify part screen of the project.
Author:
Sage Ellefson

    • partMinValidation

      private boolean partMinValidation(int min, int max)
      This method validates minimum text field on modify part page. Checks if partMin is less than or equal to 0 or if partMin is greater than or equal to partMax.
      Parameters:
      min - The minimum value for the part.
      max - The maximum value for the part.
      Returns:
      Returns boolean indicating if min is valid.

    • partMaxValidation

      private boolean partMaxValidation(int min, int max, int stock)
      This method validates maximum and inventory text fields on modify part page. Checks if partStock is greater than partMax or less than partMin.
      Parameters:
      min - The minimum value for the part.
      max - The maximum value for the part.
      stock - The stock value for the part.
      Returns:
      Returns boolean indicating if inventory is valid.

    • onCancelModifyPartScreen

      void onCancelModifyPartScreen(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      This method changes the scene back to the main screen scene when the cancel button is pressed.
      Parameters:
      event - Cancel button action on the modify part screen.
      Throws:
      IOException - From FXMLLoader.

    • saveModifyPartAction

      void saveModifyPartAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      This method gets text from a selected row in the table, updates it and returns to the main scene when save button is clicked. Modifies a part by retrieving the data in a table row then uses text fields to allow the user to update fields. Generates various error messages to ensure data is valid. Returns to the main scene if partAddSuccessful returns true.
      Parameters:
      event - Save button action on modify part page.
      Throws:
      IOException - From FXMLLoader.

    • alertsModPartOptions

      private void alertsModPartOptions(int alertsModPart)
      This method provides alerts and error messages. A switch statement with cases is used to contain alerts that can be called by numbers 1-5.
      Parameters:
      alertsModPart - Alert message options.
